item.title: How do i make a command (Rule command) [Delta] rep++ :)
item.dc:creator: @Hulkrule Hulkrule
item.description:
@Hulkrule wrote:

this is what you add.

if (command.startsWith("rules")) { sendQuest("@dre@Rules", 8144); // Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dre@ServerName Official Rules", 8145); sendQuest("@dbl@Rules.@dbl@", 8148); sendQuest("@dbl@Rules.@dbl@", 8149); sendQuest("@dbl@Rules@dbl@", 8150); sendQuest("@dbl@Rules.@dbl@",8151); sendQuest("@dbl@Rules.@dbl@",8152); sendQuest("@dbl@Rules.@dbl@",8152); sendQuest("@dbl@Rules.@dbl@",8152); sendQuest("@dblRules.@dbl@",8153); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

just put that in where your comands are. if you dont know where to put this.
Find a command you know like givemod etc…
